duties_responsibilities.duty: Review medical records for legal cases and ensure accuracy and compliance with legal standards.
Utilize advanced MS Excel skills to create pivot tables and format data for legal analysis and document preparation.
File legal documents electronically for both state and federal courts, ensuring timely and accurate submissions.
Work on-site for 3 days a week and remotely for 2 days, with a potential for increased remote work after 90 days.
Receive training on firm-specific processes and procedures while demonstrating the ability to adapt and learn quickly.

education_certification.credential: Paralegal certification or Associate degree in Paralegal Studies (Bachelor's degree preferred)
